events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I paid for.
System categorized the customer case under refund based on keywords detected in the message.
Support agent John Doe has been assigned to handle this refund request case for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m John and I will help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Here is my order number 123456 and I have attached a photo of the incorrect product that was delivered to me.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide instructions on how to return the wrong item.
Thanks! I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the refund and return instructions.
We have processed your refund and emailed the return shipping label. Please drop off the item at your nearest carrier.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and the return process was smooth. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience with our support team.
